metadata.title: CVE-2017-18009 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In OpenCV 3.3.1, a heap-based buffer over-read exists in the function cv::HdrDecoder::checkSignature in modules/imgcodecs/src/grfmt_hdr.cpp.

criterions.comment: opencv package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3').
